page.title: 03WATER RECLAMATION
page.content: 22 children visited{Hayden Water {Reclamation Works.}Mr. Owen showed us around. We saw where the sewage enters the works from Cheltenham as a dirty brown stream through the main sewer which was 5km long. Recently men went along the sewer to fix cable tv lines sewage was first raked to remove any solids..not very pleasant. The sewage was allowed to settle so that all the solids fell to the bottom and then pumped to tanks where bacteria eat the solids. Liquid sewage was put through filters where bacteria again ate the solids. When the liquid was clean it went back into the river. Solid sludge dried, is used as manure on the land. Some equipment was not working because there was no money.The Severn gets treated sewage from towns further north.Our drinkingwater comes from it!
